document_data.name: Death dog
document_data.mainbody: '''Death dogs''' were vicious and hateful two-headed [[dog]]s who had a taste for [[humanoid]] flesh.
document_data.Behavior: Death dogs had a deep burning hate for everything. They were aggressive and attacked travelers and explorers on sight.
document_data.Combat: A death dog's saliva had a potent [[poison]] that caused a rotting disease on a creature's flesh. Left unattended, it brought death in a matter of days.
document_data.Notable death dogs: * The [[wizard]] [[Draven Millovyr]] kept his possessions guarded by a ''[[glyph of warding]]'' spell that summoned death dogs against trespassers.
